about_page.content_about_1: Danny is a 3+ years experienced Full-Stack Engineer with experience in designing and delivering backend services and mobile applications.
about_page.content_about_2: He graduated from the University of Surabaya (UBAYA) in 2020 and began his career as a software-house. First he was a software developer at Hiro Solutions. After that, he continued his journey as a Backend Developer at one of the leading digital agencies and Magento partners globally, ICUBE by SIRCLO in Jakarta, in mid-2021 and served many brands. Last his journey as Full-Stack Developer at PT Inaugurasi Pelangi Nusantara in Surabaya.
about_page.content_about_3: He started his journey in 2020 and has continued to improve his skills to deliver real products.
about_page.content_skills: These are my soft skills and hard skills that I have.

resume_page.content_resume: Software Developer with extensive experience in full-stack and backend development, specializing in Laravel, Magento 2, and Flutter. Demonstrated success in optimizing codebases and deploying containerized environments, resulting in improved operational efficiency. Committed to utilizing data-driven insights to develop impactful software solutions. Open to opportunities in Full-Stack Development with a focus on transitioning into Data Science.
content_work_4: Migrated and optimized legacy codebase to Laravel, improving maintainability and reducing onboarding time by 20%.
Refactored team code with profiling tools and clean architecture, achieving a 10% reduction in code smells.
Developed reusable Composer package for shared business logic, eliminating duplicate code and accelerating feature delivery.
Applied data-system optimization techniques to streamline query execution and caching, enhancing response times and reducing server resource usage.
content_work_3: Developed mobile order monitoring application using Flutter to enhance real-time sales tracking.
Integrated geolocation features for visualizing customer distribution via interactive maps.
Implemented systematic status system for order management, reducing operational inefficiencies.
Created dynamic leaderboard system to identify high-performing products and customers.
content_work_2: Launched multiple e-commerce platforms using Magento 2, streamlining core storefront functions.
Optimized GraphQL APIs to enhance data retrieval efficiency, decreasing client-side requests by 25%.
Deployed three production sites with zero critical post-launch issues, ensuring seamless version upgrades.
Containerized service components with Docker to standardize environments and minimize deployment inconsistencies.
Integrated and automated end-to-end processes with n8n for automating data syncs.
content_work_1: Collaborated with engineering and UI/UX teams to develop in-house web applications using PHP.
Designed competition workflow mobile application utilizing Flutter.
Enhanced team productivity and streamlined processes through effective collaboration.

contact_page.description: Feel free to reach out for any inquiries or collaborations.

portfolio_page.description: This is Danny Alfandi's portfolio from his previous work, freelance projects, and personal projects/classes. You can view the details by clicking the icon link when hovering over the image.
